Title: Relates to directing the flag to be flown at half-staff to commemorate the death of certain first responders
Summary: Directs the flag to be flown at half-staff to commemorate the death of certain first responders who passed away in performance of emergency response activities in this state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to authorizing the flag to be flown at half-staff to commemorate the death of certain first responders
